FileMergingDemo.title: Multi-File Translation Support
FileMergingDemo.description: This component demonstrates how translation keys from multiple files are automatically merged together

feature.typeCheck: All merged keys maintain full TypeScript type checking
feature.autoMerge: Files are discovered and merged automatically by the plugin
feature.hotReload: Changes to any translation file trigger hot module replacement

merged.typeSafety: Every key has autocomplete support in your IDE
